FuncDef: The display tftp client command displays the current configuration of the TFTP client. The display tftp client command displays the current configuration of the TFTP client.
ExtraInfo: You can set the source IP address by using tftp client source command. You can also configure the ACL by using tftp server acl command. After setting the source IP address and configuring the ACL of a TFTP client, you can run this command to view the configuration. By default, the source IP address of a TFTP client is set to 0.0.0.0.
